product.name: 49" CHG90 QLED Gaming Monitor
product.description: Groundbreaking 49-inch super ultra-wide 32:9 curved screen fills your field of view

propertyvalue.name: Screen Size
propertyvalue.description: The diagonal measurement of a TV screen or monitor, from corner to corner.

propertyvalue.name: Resolution
propertyvalue.description: Fixed number of horizontal scan lines on a monitor. P (Progressive) means scan lines are drawn in sequence.

propertyvalue.name: Aspect Ratio
propertyvalue.description: Ratio of the width of an display to its height. 16:9 is the universal standard for high-definition display.

propertyvalue.name: Static Contrast Ratio
propertyvalue.description: Difference in light intensity between brightest color (white) & darkest (black). Higher ratio means more contrast.

propertyvalue.name: Dynamic Contrast Ratio
propertyvalue.description: Difference in luminosity between brightest color (white) & darkest (black) over time. Higher ratio means more contrast.

propertyvalue.name: Viewing Angle (Horizontal/Vertical)
propertyvalue.description: Degrees from side to side (and above to below) from which a screen can be viewed without loss of quality.

propertyvalue.name: Response Time
propertyvalue.description: Typical speed at which pixels can change color. Lower response times mean better motion image reproduction.
propertyvalue.value: 1ms (MPRT) *1ms MPRT spec is based on internal tests. Response time may vary depending on test conditions.

propertyvalue.name: Color Support
propertyvalue.description: Number of colors that an LCD monitor is capable of displaying.

propertyvalue.name: Max Stand By Power (DPMS)
propertyvalue.description: Energy consumed by a monitor while off or in sleep mode, as per Display Power Management Signaling.

propertyvalue.name: Wall-Mount (Size mm)
propertyvalue.description: Attachment for bracket that enables a monitor to hang on the wall and pivot or tilt for optimal positioning.

propertyvalue.name: Game Mode
propertyvalue.description: Mode in which a user can play video games on your television.

propertyvalue.name: Product Dimensions With Stand
propertyvalue.description: Width, height and depth of the monitor, including stand, as measured in inches (in.).

propertyvalue.name: Product Dimensions Without Stand
propertyvalue.description: Width, height and depth of the monitor, without stand, as measured in inches (in.).

propertyvalue.name: Product Weight With Stand
propertyvalue.description: Weight of the monitor, as measured in pounds (lb.).

propertyvalue.name: Product Weight Without Stand
propertyvalue.description: Weight of the television, without stand, as measured in pounds (lb.).

propertyvalue.name: HDMI
propertyvalue.description: High-Definition Multimedia Interface. The industry standard for transmitting HD video for display.

propertyvalue.name: Audio In (3.5mm)
propertyvalue.description: Terminals on a monitor that accept sound from other components.

propertyvalue.name: Humidity
propertyvalue.description: Minimum and maximum air moisture in which a camera will operate, as measured in percentage.

product.description: No compromise on clarity even when you zoom in, amazing night vision, room temperature and humidity tracking, two-way and continuous background audio- all with reliable and secure connection.

metatags.twitter:title: Shop the Lumi Smart Baby Monitor
metatags.og:title: Shop the Lumi Smart Baby Monitor
metatags.og:description: See and hear your baby anywhere, anytime with the Smart Baby Monitor from Lumi. With an ultra-wide, 1080p camera, parents can check in on baby and even monitor overnight sleeping with high-definition night vision. Listen in on baby 24/7 with continuous background audio, and soothe your little one with clear two-way audio. With end-to-end encryption, the Smart Baby Monitor allows parents to safely share with baby’s caregiving circle, so no one has to miss a moment.
metatags.twitter:description: See and hear your baby anywhere, anytime with the Smart Baby Monitor from Lumi. With an ultra-wide, 1080p camera, parents can check in on baby and even monitor overnight sleeping with high-definition night vision. With end-to-end encryption, the Smart Baby Monitor allows parents to safely share with baby’s caregiving circle, so no one has to miss a moment.

answer.author: ChrisPSM
answer.text: Information regarding adjusting the angle of the monitor can be found in the Owner's Manual on page 13. https://www.lg.com/us/support/product/lg-29WK50S-P.AUS

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: We would recommend checking with the manufacturer of the security camera regarding what is necessary to use the cameras with a monitor. ^CP

answer.author: CommunityAnswer
answer.text: No, this unit doesn't have both an HDMI and Type C USB port.

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: The LG 29 Inch Class 21:9 UltraWide® Full HD IPS LED Monitor with AMD FreeSync (29'' Diagonal), Model # 29WK50S-P features 2 x HDMI ports on it for connectivity. You can find USB-C to HDMI...

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: You can find helpful tips on using Screen Split 2.0 in the following help video: https://www.lg.com/us/support/video-tutorials/ultrawide-monitor:-4-screen-split-monitor-CT10000018-1441921251016...

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: No, the 29WK50S-P does not have built-in speakers. ^CP

answer.author: CommunityAnswer
answer.text: No, it doesn't have a built-in speaker.

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: The 29WK50S-P can connect to a computer using a HDMI cable. We do not have information regarding adapters that could be used to enable connectivity. ^CP

answer.author: LGAnswers
answer.text: Yes, a HDMI cable is listed as an included accessory. ^CP

answer.author: LCopJunior73
answer.text: Not sure about the response time but when gaming, I get max 75Hz. Not too shabby considering my GPU is a few years old and this monitor is taking good care of it. Looks amazing. Good luck.
